subtitle.withoutAppointee: [CY] These will be used to send you information about your appeal.

withoutAppointee.required: [CY] Enter the first line of your address

withAppointee.required: [CY] Enter the first line of their address

withoutAppointee.invalid: [CY] You have entered an invalid character. Check your address and enter it again

withAppointee.invalid: [CY] You have entered an invalid character. Check their address and enter it again

withoutAppointee.required: [CY] Enter the town or city from your address

withAppointee.required: [CY] Enter the town or city from their address

withoutAppointee.required: [CY] Enter the county from your address

withAppointee.required: [CY] Enter the county from their address

withoutAppointee.required: [CY] Enter the postcode from your address
withoutAppointee.invalidPostcode: [CY] The online appeal service is not available to people from this region. This postcode should match the postcode you entered to access the service.

withAppointee.required: [CY] Enter the postcode from their address
withAppointee.invalidPostcode: [CY] The online appeal service is not available to people from this region. This postcode should match the postcode you entered to access the service.

phoneNumber.title: [CY] Phone number (optional)
phoneNumber.hint: [CY] This may be used to contact you about your appeal

withoutAppointee.invalid: [CY] You have entered an invalid phone number. Check it and enter it again

withAppointee.invalid: [CY] You have entered an invalid phone number. Check it and enter it again
